content.rendered:
We are proud to have a high speed faiba internet connection that is helping in facilitation of studies and research among the teachers and students. The internet is helping us in managing our different systems, including the student record management system, our 24/7 CCTV surveillance system cameras, which are internet based to store footage in cloud servers and also facilitating studies like computer  and research.

The internet has helped us boost our perfomance since students can now get all information at hand. Teachers can comfortably do their research in their studies, thanks to widespread wifi connection.
